title: Complex Polar Calculator
description:
CPOL produces a complex number in polar form. The input values of L and
A specify the length (radius) and the angle.
name: CPOL

input.name: L
input.description: The magnitude of the complex number in polar coordinates.

input.name: A
input.description: The angle (in radians) of the complex number in polar coordinates.

output.name: CPOL
output.description: A complex number represented with a real part and an imaginary part.

return_value.description: The result of the conversion from polar to rectangular form for the complex number.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the complex number.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the complex number.
